Blastflower.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with your weapon shots increases the damage they take from weapon shots by 80 for 3s, stacking up to 3 times.

Fauna.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% when Out of Combat.

Flitter.card_desc: [Flutter] Reduce the Cooldown of Flutter by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Just Believe!.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=8|8}% after getting an Elimination.

Nightshade.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Dead Zone damage is increased to 500.

Photosynthesis.card_desc: [Seedling] Increase the Projectile Speed of Seedling by {scale=6|6}%.

Pixie Dust.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Heal for {scale=65|65} every 1s while standing in Dead Zone.

Scorn.card_desc: [Seedling] Increase the damage of each Seedling to 750 and reduce the time it takes for them to explode by 25%.

Shenanigans.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=5|5}% for 2.5s after activating Dead Zone.

Sparkle.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Increase the duration of Dead Zone by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Spritely.card_desc: [Flutter] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=5|5}% for 3s after activating Flutter.

Sprouts.card_desc: [Seedling] Reduce the Cooldown of Seedling by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for each enemy hit by it.

Twilight.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Reduce the Cooldown of Dead Zone by {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Aberglaube.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=8|8}%.

Fauna.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo außerhalb des Kampfes um {scale=8|8}%.

Feenstaub.card_desc: [Todeszone] Stehst du in der Todeszone, wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=65|65} LP geheilt.

Flatterei.card_desc: [Geflatter] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Geflatter um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Flora.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Fotosynthese.card_desc: [Setzling] Erhöht das Geschosstempo von Setzling um {scale=6|6}%.

Funkeln.card_desc: [Todeszone] Erhöht die Dauer von Todeszone um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Hohn.card_desc: [Setzling] Der Schaden jedes Setzlings wird auf 750 erhöht und die Zeit bis zur Zündung um 25% reduziert.

Keimung.card_desc: [Setzling] Nach Verwendung von Setzling wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Klamauk.card_desc: [Todeszone] Betrittst du die Todeszone, erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2,5s lang um {scale=5|5}%.

Kolibri.card_desc: [Geflatter] Nach Aktivierung von Geflatter wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Nachtschatten.card_desc: [Todeszone] Erhöht den Schaden von Todeszone auf 500.

Nektar.card_desc: [Setzling] Nach Verwendung von Setzling wirst du {scale=75|75} LP geheilt.

Possen.card_desc: [Geflatter] Nach Aktivierung von Geflatter wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Quicklebendig.card_desc: [Geflatter] Nach Aktivierung von Geflatter wird erlittener Schaden 3s lang um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Sprengblume.card_desc: [Waffe] Von deiner Waffe getroffene Ziele erleiden durch deine Waffenschüsse 3s lang zusätzlich 80 Schaden. Bis zu 3-mal stapelbar.

Triebe.card_desc: [Setzling] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Setzling für jeden damit getroffenen Gegner um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Zwielicht.card_desc: [Todeszone] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Todeszone um {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Belladone.card_desc: [Zone morte] L'explosion initiale de Zone morte inflige 500 dégâts.

Colibri.card_desc: [Battement d'ailes] Battement d'ailes vous redonne {scale=1|1} munitions(s).

Cr\u00e9dulit\u00e9.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=8|8}%.

Cr\u00e9puscule.card_desc: [Zone morte] Zone morte se recharge {scale=0.8|0.8}s plus vite.

D\u00e9dain.card_desc: [Semis] Chaque semis inflige 750 dégâts et le délai avant leur explosion est réduit de 25%.

\u00c9tincelle.card_desc: [Zone morte] Zone morte dure {scale=0.5|0.5}s de plus.

Faune.card_desc: [Arme/Armure] Votre vitesse hors combat augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Feu follet.card_desc: [Battement d'ailes] Vous subissez {scale=5|5}% de dégâts en moins pendant 3s après Battement d'ailes.

Fleur explosive.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque tir d'arme augmente vos dégâts d'arme de 80 contre la cible touchée pendant 3s. Effet cumulable 3 fois.

Frasques.card_desc: [Battement d'ailes] Battement d'ailes vous redonne {scale=50|50} PV.

Jeune pousse.card_desc: [Semis] Semis se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite par ennemi atteint.

Manigance.card_desc: [Zone morte] Activer Zone morte augmente votre vitesse de {scale=5|5}% pendant 2,5s.

Photosynth\u00e8se.card_desc: [Semis] La vitesse du projectile de Semis augmente de {scale=6|6}%.

Poussi\u00e8re de f\u00e9e.card_desc: [Zone morte] Vous récupérez {scale=65|65} PV/s dans la Zone morte.

Singeries.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

Vol d'oiseau.card_desc: [Battement d'ailes] Battement d'ailes se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

\u4ed9\u9732\u743c\u6d46.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 激活爆裂之种后回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u5149\u5408\u4f5c\u7528.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 激活爆裂之种后，3秒内移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%

\u53e4\u7075\u7cbe\u602a.card_desc: [武器] 武器装填速度提高{scale=5|5}%

\u53fd\u55b3\u8702\u9e1f.card_desc: [振翅] 使用振翅后回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u542b\u82de\u5f85\u653e.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 爆裂之种每命中一个敌人，冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u6574\u4eba\u628a\u620f.card_desc: [枯萎禁区] 进入枯萎禁区后移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续4秒

\u66ae\u5149\u4e4b\u606f.card_desc: [枯萎禁区] 枯萎禁区的冷却时间缩短{scale=0.7|0.7}秒

\u73a9\u800d\u5b09\u620f.card_desc: [振翅] 使用振翅后回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u751f\u6839\u53d1\u82bd.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 激活爆裂之种后获得{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u76f8\u4fe1\u6211\uff01.card_desc: [护甲] 参与击败可以使所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=10|10}%

\u7cbe\u7075\u7c89\u672b.card_desc: [枯萎禁区] 站在枯萎禁区内每秒回复{scale=25|25}点生命值

\u7efd\u653e\u4e4b\u82b1.card_desc: [武器] 普通攻击每次命中目标时伤害都会提高100点，最多叠加3次。

\u7fa4\u517d\u5954\u817e.card_desc: [护甲] 脱离战斗后移动速度提升{scale=8|8}%

\u81ea\u5728\u98de\u7fd4.card_desc: [振翅] 振翅的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u8511\u89c6\u4e4b\u79cd.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 每颗爆裂之种造成的伤害提高350点，引爆时间缩短25%

\u95ea\u95ea\u53d1\u5149.card_desc: [枯萎禁区] 枯萎禁区的持续时间提高{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u968f\u98ce\u821e\u52a8.card_desc: [振翅] 使用振翅后3秒内，受到的伤害降低{scale=5|5}%

\u00a1Cree!.card_desc: [Armadura] Se reducen tus recargas activas un {scale=8|8}% después de obtener una eliminación.

Aleteo.card_desc: [Aleteo] Se reduce la recarga de Aleteo en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Belladona.card_desc: [Zona muerta] El daño de Zona muerta aumenta a 500 PS.

Bomba floral.card_desc: [Arma] Alcanzar a un enemigo con tus disparos de arma aumenta el daño que este recibe de disparos de armas en 80 PS durante 3s, acumulándose hasta 3 veces.

Briosa.card_desc: [Aleteo] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=5|5}% durante 3s tras activar Aleteo.

Colibr\u00ed.card_desc: [Aleteo] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al activar Aleteo.

Crep\u00fasculo.card_desc: [Zona muerta] Se reduce la recarga de Zona muerta en {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Desprecio.card_desc: [Plántula] El daño de cada Plántula aumenta en 750 PS y reduce el tiempo que tardan en explotar un 25%.

Fauna.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% mientras estés fuera de combate

Flora.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Fotos\u00edntesis.card_desc: [Plántula] Aumenta la velocidad de proyectil de Plántula un {scale=6|6}%.

Germinaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Plántula] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición tras activar Plántula.

Graciosa.card_desc: [Aleteo] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS tras activar Aleteo.

N\u00e9ctar.card_desc: [Plántula] Te curas {scale=75|75} PS tras activar Plántula.

Payasadas.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=5|5}%.

Polvo de hada.card_desc: [Zona muerta] Te curas {scale=65|65} PS cada 1s dentro de la Zona muerta.

Resplandor.card_desc: [Zona muerta] La duración de Zona muerta aumenta en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Reto\u00f1o.card_desc: [Plántula] Se reduce la recarga de Plántula en {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada enemigo que alcanza.

Travesuras.card_desc: [Zona muerta] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=5|5}% durante 2,5s tras activar Zona muerta.

Ardil.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=5|5}% por 2,5s ao ativar a Zona Morta.

Arrebol.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Reduz o intervalo da Zona Morta em {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Basta Acreditar.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz os intervalos ativos em {scale=8|8}% após conseguir uma eliminação.

Beija-flor.card_desc: [Flutuar] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição após ativar Flutuar.

Brotos.card_desc: [Semeadura] Reduz o intervalo da Semeadura em {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada inimigo atingido por ela.

Clar\u00e3o.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Aumenta a duração de Zona Morta em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Esc\u00e1rnio.card_desc: [Semeadura] Aumenta o dano de cada semente em 750 e reduz em 25% o tempo que ela leva para explodir.

Fauna.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=8|8}% enquanto estiver fora do combate.

Flor Explosiva.card_desc: [Arma] Atingir um inimigo com os disparos da sua arma aumenta em 80 o dano que ele toma dos disparos da sua arma por 3s, estocando até 3 vezes.

Flora.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Fotoss\u00edntese.card_desc: [Semeadura] Aumenta em {scale=6|6}% a velocidade do projétil da Semeadura.

Germina\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Semeadura] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição depois de usar Semeadura.

N\u00e9ctar.card_desc: [Semeadura] Você se cura em {scale=75|75} de vida após usar Semeadura.

Palha\u00e7adas.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a velocidade em que recarrega a arma.

P\u00f3 de Fada.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Você se cura em {scale=65|65} a cada 1s em que estiver na Zona Morta.

Sombra da Noite.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Aumenta em 500 o dano causado pela Zona Morta.

Trote.card_desc: [Flutuar] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} de vida ao ativar Flutuar.

V\u00edvida.card_desc: [Flutuar] Reduz em {scale=5|5}% o dano recebido por 3s após ativar Flutuar.

Zanzando.card_desc: [Flutuar] Reduz o intervalo de Flutuar em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

\u0412\u0437\u0440\u044b\u0432\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Попадания по врагу из оружия повышают его входящий урон от выстрелов на 80 ед. на 3 с. Эффект суммируется до 3 раз.

\u0412\u043e\u043b\u0448\u0435\u0431\u04.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] Находясь в Мертвой зоне, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=65|65} ед. в секунду.
[Переполох] После активации Переполоха вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% меньше урона в течение 3 с.

\u0418\u0441\u043a\u0440\u0430.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] Длительность Мертвой зоны увеличивается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041d\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0430\u0440.card_desc: [Саженец] Активация Саженца исцеляет вас на {scale=75|75} ед.

\u041e\u0437\u043e\u0440\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Переполох] Активация Переполоха исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041f\u0430\u0441\u043b\u0435\u043d.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] Урон от Мертвой зоны повышается до 500.

\u041f\u043e\u0431\u0435\u0433\u0438.card_desc: [Саженец] Попадания Саженцем сокращают его перезарядку на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041f\u043e\u0432\u0435\u0440\u044c \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=8|8}%.

\u041f\u0440\u0435\u0437\u0440\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Саженец] Каждый Саженец наносит 750 ед. урона, а время до взрыва уменьшается на 25%.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u043a\u0430\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] При попадании в Мертвую зону ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=5|5}% на 2,5 с.

\u0421\u0443\u043c\u0435\u0440\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] Перезарядка Мертвой зоны сокращается на {scale=0.8|0.8} с.

\u0424\u0430\u0443\u043d\u0430.card_desc: [Броня] Ваша скорость передвижения вне боя повышается на {scale=8|8}%.

\u0424\u043b\u043e\u0440\u0430.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

Fauna.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}%, gdy jesteś poza walką.

Flora.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Fotosynteza.card_desc: [Kiełek] Zwiększa szybkość pocisku dla Kiełka o {scale=6|6}%.

Iskrzenie.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Wydłuża czas trwania Martwej strefy o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Kie\u0142kowanie.card_desc: [Kiełek] Wytwarza {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji po użyciu Kiełka.

Kombinowanie.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Aktywacja Martwej strefy zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=5|5}% na 2,5 s.

Lekko\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Trzepot] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o {scale=5|5}% przez 3 od aktywacji Trzepotu.

\u0141opot.card_desc: [Trzepot] Skraca czas odnowienia Trzepotu o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Mrok nocy.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Obrażenia od Martwej strefy są zwiększone o 500.

P\u0119dy.card_desc: [Kiełek] Skraca czas odnowienia Kiełka o {scale=0.5|0.5} s za każdego trafionego nim wroga.

Pogarda.card_desc: [Kiełek] Zwiększa obrażenia od każdego Kiełka do 750 i skraca czas potrzebny im do wybuchu o 25%.

Uwierz w siebie!.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają twoje aktywne czasy odnowień o {scale=8|8}%.

Wr\u00f3\u017ckowy py\u0142.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Przywraca ci {scale=65|65} PZ co 1 s podczas przebywania w Martwej strefie.

Wybuchowy kwiat.card_desc: [Broń] Trafienie wroga strzałem z broni zwiększa obrażenia otrzymane od strzałów z broni o 80 na 3 s (maks. 3 kumulacje).

Zmierzch.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Skraca czas odnowienia Martwej strefy o {scale=0.8|0.8} s.

Alacakaranl\u0131k.card_desc: [Ölü Bölge] Ölü Bölge'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.8|0.8}sn azalt.

A\u015fa\u011f\u0131lama.card_desc: [Fide] Her Fide'nin hasarını 750 artır ve patlama süresini %25 azalt.

\u00c7i\u00e7ek Patlamas\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Silah atışların ile bir düşmanı vurduğunda 3sn boyunca silah atışlarından aldıkları hasar 80 artar. 3 defaya kadar birikebilir.

\u00c7\u0131rp\u0131nma.card_desc: [Kanat Çırp] Kanat Çırp'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.

Filizler.card_desc: [Fide] Fide ile vurduğun her düşman için Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

Hayaletsi.card_desc: [Kanat Çırp] Kanat Çırp'ı etkinleştirdikten sonra 3sn boyunca aldığın hasarı %{scale=5|5} azalt.

\u0130nan Yeter!.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma sonrası aktif bekleme sürelerini %{scale=8|8} azalt.

Muziplik.card_desc: [Ölü Bölge] Ölü Bölge'yi etkinleştirdikten sonra Hareket Hızını 2,5sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} artır.

Peri Tozu.card_desc: [Ölü Bölge] Ölü Bölge'de dururken her 1 saniyede {scale=65|65} Can iyileş.

\u015eamata.card_desc: [Kanat Çırp] Kanat Çırp'ı etkinleştirdikten sonra {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

Sinek Ku\u015fu.card_desc: [Kanat Çırp] Kanat Çırp'ı etkinleştirdikten sonra {scale=1|1} Cephane oluştur.
